## Experiment

```{r}
ggplot(mtcars) + 
  aes(x = wt, y = mpg, color = factor(am)) + 
  geom_rug() + 
  geom_point() + 
  geom_smooth(orientation = "y", 
              method = lm,
              formula = y ~ 1)

ggplot(mtcars) + 
  aes(x = wt, y = 1) + 
  geom_rug() + 
  geom_smooth(orientation = "y", 
              method = lm,
              formula = y ~ 1)
```


# pre- computation

```{r}
mean_wt <- data.frame(cyl = c(4, 6, 8), wt = c(2.28, 3.11, 4.00))

ggplot(mtcars, aes(wt,mpg,  colour = wt)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_vline(aes(xintercept = wt, colour = wt), mean_wt) +
  facet_wrap(~ cyl,
             ncol = 1)
```

# a terrible hack with stat_summary and point

```{r}

ggplot(mtcars) + 
  aes(x = wt) +
  geom_rug() + 
  geom_histogram() +
  stat_summary(fun = "median", 
               geom = "point", 
               size = 100, 
               orientation = "y", 
               shape = 3, 
               aes(y = 0)
               ) + 
  aes(color = factor(am)) + 
  facet_wrap(~factor(am),
             ncol = 1) 

last_plot() + 
  guides(color = "none")

```
